sen.j: 1477年（文明 (日本)9）日意が京都の法華宗徒の為、日蓮の骨舎利を分骨し、薬屋妙善の帰依を得て、一条尻切屋町に堂一宇を建立、関西身延と称する。
sen.e: In 1477, on behalf of the followers of the Nichiren sect in Kyoto, the monk Nichii had his cremated bones divided up among Nichiren believers, thereby securing the conversion of Myozen KUSURIYA to the Nichiren sect and erecting Doichiu temple in Shirikiraya-machi on Ichijo Avenue, earning the nickname Kansai Minobu.
